topComments.author: Ashlie Lee
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) As etapas para um dos slides s√£o muito fracas. O p√© do marido estava afundando a cada passo que ele dava (e ele n√£o √© obeso). Isso foi assustador. Fora isso, tudo foi √≥timo, n√£o muito lotado, os pre√ßos eram decentes. O lugar era principalmente limpo. As crian√ßas se divertiram muito!  (Original) Steps to one of the slides are very weak. Husbands foot was sinking down with every step he took (and he's not obese). This was scary. Other than that, everything was great, not too over crowded, prices were decent. Place was mostly clean. Kids had a blast!

topComments.author: Kate Johnson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque aqu√°tico muito lindo. √â muito divertido para crian√ßas e pais. Fui em uma sexta-feira e n√£o estava muito lotado, foi definitivamente um destaque do ver√£o. Apesar de estar ocupado, o sub do Larry's localizado no parque tinha sandu√≠ches extremamente deliciosos, eu pessoalmente tinha um clube de peru. Tamb√©m os biscoitos frescos por US$ 0,75 tamb√©m foram surpreendentes. Al√©m da comida, os slides foram muito divertidos e permitiram que meu amigo e eu us√°ssemos √≥culos, j√° que usamos lentes de contato. Eu recomendo a qualquer fam√≠lia com crian√ßas de qualquer idade, eu aprecio este parque aqu√°tico h√° muitos anos e definitivamente espero voltar no futuro!  (Original) Very lovely Waterpark. It's really fun for kids and parents alike. I went on a Friday and it was not too crowded, it was definitely a highlight of the summer. Despite being busy, the Larry's sub located in the park had extremely delicious sandwiches, I personally had a turkey club. Also the fresh cookies for $0.75 were amazing as well. Aside from the food, the slides were very fun and allowed my friend and I to wear goggles since we wear contacts. I recommend to any family with kids of any age, I have enjoyed this water park for many years and definitely look forward to coming back in the future!

topComments.author: Ledora Whitehead
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um lugar divertido e conveniente para crian√ßas e adultos. Os pre√ßos s√£o incr√≠veis $ 25 no Wendy's e $ 28 no fim de semana. √Åreas para crian√ßas menores para Al's morrem todos para se divertir. Al√©m disso, fica a apenas uma hora de Jacksonville! N√£o recebo muitas fotos porque tive que colocar meu celular no arm√°rio para me divertir o m√°ximo poss√≠vel lol.  (Original) This is such a fun, convenient fun place for kids and adults. The prices are amazing $25 though the Wendy‚Äôs and $28 through the weekend. Areas for smaller children to Al‚Äôs die everyone to have fun. Plus it‚Äôs only an hour away from Jacksonville! I don‚Äôt get many pics because I had to put my phone in the locker to have as much fun as possible lol.

topComments.author: Julia Shvachko
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Teve um √≥timo dia no Summer Waves. O parque aqu√°tico √© surpreendentemente grande para o que eu imaginava, o que explica um pre√ßo de US$ 28 por pessoa. 10 passeios totais de slides, duas grandes √°reas para crian√ßas pequenas e um rio lento decente. Adorei a ideia de pulseira com c√≥digo qr para arm√°rios em vez de chave ou cart√£o old school! O parque geral era agrad√°vel e limpo, poucos estandes de consession com comida, bebidas, lanches e sorvetes. Muitos funcion√°rios no local, muitos salva-vidas. Uma coisa importante que fez dissapont foi banheiros. Quando um parque est√° lotado com algumas centenas de pessoas, voc√™ n√£o pode esperar correr suavemente sobre um banheiro pequeno e extremamente sujo com apenas 4 cabines e outro min√∫sculo com apenas 2 cabines. Talvez algo que eles devam considerar e tenho certeza de que n√£o sou o primeiro a trazer isso √† tona. No geral, nosso dia passou voando e nos divertimos muito e provavelmente voltaremos no futuro!  (Original) Had a great day at Summer Waves. Water park is surprisingly big for what I imagined it to be which explains a price of $28 per person. 10 total slide rides, two great areas for small kids and decent lazy river. Loved the idea of bracelet with qr code for lockers instead of old school key or card! Overall park was nice and clean, few consession stands with food, drinks, snacks and ice cream. Plenty of staff on site, plenty of lifeguards. One major thing that did dissapont was bathrooms. When a park is packed with couple hundred people you can't expect to run smoothly over small extremely dirty bathroom with 4 stalls only and another tiny one with just 2 stalls. Maybe something they should consider and I am sure I am not the first one to bring this up. Overall our day just flew by and we have a great time and likely will be back in future!

topComments.author: Alicia Walker
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Em Jekyll para f√©rias e precisava de algo diferente no final da semana. Este parque foi perfeito para os nossos pequeninos, Shark Tooth Cove era uma √°rea incr√≠vel. O parque tem muitos pontos com sombra para se esconder do sol e o estacionamento foi f√°cil e pr√≥ximo.  (Original) On Jekyll for vacation and needed something different late in the week. This park was perfect for our little ones, Shark Tooth Cove was an awesome area. The park has plenty of shady spots to duck out of the sun and parking was easy and close.

topComments.author: Misti Jane
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar estava cheio de divers√£o para toda a minha fam√≠lia! De 7 a 40 anos at√© foi eleito o MELHOR LUGAR DE SEMPRE pelo meu filho! Ele pegou um pouco de ar no slide preto e simplesmente amou! O parque e os banheiros est√£o sempre limpos e agrad√°veis! Tende a ficar um pouco lotado nos fins de semana, mas que parque aqu√°tico n√£o fica ?! Como poderia esquecer o pessoal e a comida excelente! Tudo est√° a uma curta dist√¢ncia a p√© dentro do parque! C√£es de servi√ßo s√£o aceitos, o que foi uma grande vantagem!  (Original) This place was packed with fun for my entire family! Ages 7 to 40 üòÅ even was voted BEST PLACE EVER by my son! He caught some air on the black slide and absolutely loved it! The park and restrooms are always clean and pleasant! It does tend to get a little crowded on the weekends but what water park doesn't?! How could I forget the staff and the food was excellent! Everything is in close walking distance inside the park! Service dogs are accepted which was a big plus!

topComments.author: Stephanie D.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque aqu√°tico era limpo e h√° um servi√ßo simp√°tico.  Os arm√°rios s√£o caros, mas valem a pena para a experi√™ncia de todo o dia.  √Ågua e comida / produtos para beb√™s s√£o permitidos no parque. Sem comida de fora.  As filas para as barracas de comida s√£o longas e o servi√ßo √© lento, como a maioria dos lugares no momento (pandemia).  A maioria dos slides exige 48 polegadas ou mais. E qualquer pessoa com 10 anos ou menos deve estar acompanhada de um adolescente / adulto mais velho. Planeje adequadamente para pessoas com menos de 48 polegadas (h√° 4 passeios que as pessoas da categoria podem fazer / fazer).  (Original) The water park was clean and and there is friendly service.  The lockers are pricy but worthwhile for all day experience.  Water and baby food/products are allowed in the park. No outside food.  Lines are long for the food stands and service is slow as most places are at this time (pandemic).  Most of the slides require 48 inches or taller. And anyone 10 and under must be with an older teen/adult.   Plan accordingly for people just under 48 inches (there are 4 rides that folks in the category can ride/do).

topComments.author: Nikus Allen
topComments.comment: This is an outstanding water park for families with young children. We have a 2 year old and ride options at most parks are very limited(makes sense). BUT Shark Tooth Cove at Summer Waves kept our son gleefully entertained for literal HOURS! It's setup like it's own little private beach and I believe the water is only 1' at it's deepest points. From a parental perspective it was very easy to walk around with him and monitor him without hovering and taking space away from the other kids.  The lazy river is also a much appreciated lounging break between slide watching duty. The wave pool is... a wave pool, but it's a lot of fun if you or your kids enjoy playing in waves. There's also a nice splash pad towards the back left that's great for cooling off and it even has a massive dump bucket that's fun and probably makes for some great reaction footage! As a bonus, their locker system is very well done and convenient.  All in all, this was a great park and probably one of the most fun activities we did on our road trip! You should be buying your tickets by now.

topComments.author: david willis
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque de grande tamanho com muito o que fazer e ainda n√£o sobrecarregar voc√™. Muitos salva-vidas em todo o parque para garantir que as crian√ßas estejam seguras. Arm√°rios pequenos, m√©dios e grandes dispon√≠veis. Cabanas s√£o semiprivadas, mas √≥timas se voc√™ precisar de abrigo. Adoraria ver a √°rea de almofada de jogo para crian√ßas ter o acolchoamento macio. Os lanches s√£o √≥timos e os pre√ßos s√£o os que voc√™ esperaria em qualquer lugar. Nunca se sente muito ocupado, todo mundo sempre parece muito agrad√°vel de se lidar. Um ponto de visita anual para n√≥s.  (Original) Great size park with plenty to do and still not overwhelm you. Plenty of lifeguards across the park to ensure the kids are safe. Small Medium and Large Lockers available. Cabanas are semi private but great if you need shelter. Would love to see the play pad area for kids have the soft padding. Snacks are great and prices are what you would expect anywhere. Never feels to busy, everyone always seems very pleasant to deal with. A yearly visit spot for us.

topComments.author: Kim Wright - Ledbetter
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este foi um parque aqu√°tico incr√≠vel que nos levou de volta no tempo para os dias de inf√¢ncia, correndo e brincando no sol e na √°gua. Entrada acess√≠vel, tubos gratuitos em cada passeio e as vistas do topo das torres de passeio eram lindas!  (Original) This was an awesome water park that took us back in time to childhood days, running and playing in the sun and water. Affordable entry, free tubes at each ride, and the views from the top of the ride towers were beautiful!

topComments.author: Jeremy Dunn
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo lugar! A equipe foi super amig√°vel e o parque era muito limpo. As crian√ßas se divertiram. Definitivamente iria novamente.  (Original) Great place! The staff was super friendly and the park was very clean. Kids had fun. Would definitely go again.

topComments.author: matt ivy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Levamos nossa neta para o anivers√°rio dela neste fim de semana do Memorial Day 2022 e gostamos da experi√™ncia. Alugamos uma cabana para minha fam√≠lia, mas havia algumas coisas que poderiam ter sido melhores. O parque precisa de mais chuveiros, a geladeira em nossa cabana n¬∫ 9 n√£o funcionou e a comida era med√≠ocre. No entanto, a equipe foi amig√°vel, atento √† seguran√ßa dos visitantes, √∫til quando necess√°rio e todos com quem falei foram educados. Por isso ainda dei 5 estrelas. Atendimento ao cliente significa tudo para mim. Certamente voltaremos, o Senhor assim o far√°. Summer Waves vale a viagem.  (Original) We took our granddaughter for her birthday this Memorial Day Weekend 2022 and enjoyed the experience. We rented a cabana for my family but there where a few things that could have been better. The park needs more showers, the refrigerator in our cabana #9 didn't work and the food was mediocre. However the staff was friendly, observant of the safety of the visitors, helpful  when needed and everyone that I spoke with was polite. That is the reason I still gave 5 stars. Customer service means every thing to me. We will certainly return, the Lord will it. Summer Waves is worth the trip.

topComments.author: Ebbe Juuelz
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Queria levar minha fam√≠lia para a onda de ver√£o por um tempo, acabamos indo hoje e nos divertimos muito  (Original) Wanted to take my family out to Summer wave for a while we ended up going today and had a great time

topComments.author: David Panda
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Pequeno parque aqu√°tico, que estava muito lotado, demorou um pouco para encontrar estacionamento, os carros estavam bloqueando uns aos outros, as pessoas tinham que estacionar na grama e fazer suas pr√≥prias vagas, o parque em si era muito bom, embora houvesse um esgoto ruim cheiro perto da entrada principal, as crian√ßas gostaram das atra√ß√µes e no geral foi uma boa experi√™ncia para o dinheiro.  (Original) Small water park, which was very crowded, it took awhile to find parking, cars were blocking each other in, people had to park in the grass and make their own spaces, the park it self was pretty good although, there was a bad sewerage smell near the main entrance, the kids enjoyed the attractions and overall was a good experience for the money.

topComments.author: Marcia Pierce
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fomos e atualmente somos titulares de passes de temporada. Esta √© uma das coisas favoritas dos meus filhos para fazer durante todo o ver√£o. Ficamos t√£o impressionados este ano. Eles tinham todos os novos carros aleg√≥ricos e at√© mesmo o tipo que voc√™ pode apenas relaxar. Os slides do Man O' War estavam todos abertos e funcionando e s√£o divertidos e r√°pidos! Mal podemos esperar para voltar e pedalar mais!  (Original) We have been and currently are season pass holders. This is one of my kids favorite things to do all summer.  We were so impressed this year. They had all new floats and even the kind you can just lounge in.  The Man O' War slides were all open and running and they are fun and fast!  We can't wait to come back and ride more!

topComments.author: Amari Graves
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo local para relaxar com aquela fam√≠lia e vencer o calor. N√£o √© o maior parque, mas definitivamente tivemos um bom tempo. Fui cedo e o estacionamento era abundante e as filas andavam r√°pido. N√£o h√° necessidade de pagar antecipadamente, embora eu ache que para os novatos √© melhor estar preparado em caso de grandes multid√µes.  (Original) Great spot to chill with that family and beat the heat. Not the biggest park but definitely had a good time. Went early and the parking was plentiful and the lines moved quick. No need to pay in advance although I guess for first timers better to be prepared in case of huge crowds.

topComments.author: amanda depratter
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s amamos este lugar. Eles adicionaram v√°rios outros pontos de sombra e s√£o apreciados  (Original) We love this place.  They have added several more shade spots and they are appreciated

topComments.author: Ben Smith
topComments.comment: My kids loved the place we got the season passes for all 4 of us.  We thoroughly enjoyed the place.  Be aware though to get to the park if you don't have an annual pass to get on to Jekyll Island you will have to pay an entry fee.

topComments.author: H.P Johnson
topComments.comment: Summer waves was a really nice place to go too. My family and I went last week. Everyone enjoyed themselves.  There was something for everyone. I loved how they had life guards everywhere even in the kiddie sections. If you are not a great swimmer or you can not swim at all don't worry they do have life jackets. Majority of there pools are 3 ft except for the water wave section. It does go up to 7ft. For me I always go up a ft when they tell you it's a certain ft because it seems more than what they really tell you in my opinion.  They have Larry's Giant sub. That was ok it wasn't that good to me. But everything else at the park was fun. Just bring your own food or snacks to eat.

topComments.author: Shannon Kirkwood
topComments.comment: Kiddos had fun. I wish they would add more pools or activities. Also, that black slide needs to be tore down and build better. It‚Äôs wobbly and poorly built. Honestly the fact that everywhere we went our feet we‚Äôre literally on fire from the hot concrete was a major turn off for us. Husband and babies have blisters on their feet from walking from point A to B. We finally started taking the lazy river to get from one side of park to the other to avoid the extremely hot side walks. They have paint that could help reflect most of that heat and I‚Äôm surprised no one thought to use it. Also, the flooring on the lazy river is coming up really bad to the point of making it difficult to walk because of how high the floor rises. Probably would never go back.
